ygData.subject: Clay Dieties
ygData.msgSnippet: I know that there was some discussion on this back in February, and 2 recipes were posted (small protection and small resistance). Were any more discovered?
ygData.messageBody:
I know that there was some discussion on this back in February, and 2
recipes were posted (small protection and small resistance). Were any
more discovered?

Has Verant done anything to fix the equipping problem, or did we just
never figure out how to use them properly? I know that race and diety
worship was tried and nothing resolved.


-Khazade
Dwarf Paladin
Master Potter, Blacksmith, Tailor, Fletcher, Brewer, Linguistics,
Butcher, Baker, Candlestick Maker
Tallon Zek
